package.name: Validate_ISPN
package.summary: Validation class for ISPN (International Standard Product Numbers)
package.description: Package containes ISPN (International Standard Product Numbers) validations such as: * ISSN * ISBN * ISMN * EAN8 * EAN13 * EAN14 * UCC12 * SSCC

release.notes: - Split from Validate into independent package - CS fixes - Added product_numbers test (tests for ISSN, EAN8, EAN13, EAN14, UCC12 and SSCC)
